ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to deploy WARs to jetty server
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: See [this](https://forum.flowable.org/t/unable-to-deploy-flowable-wars-to-jetty-server/) forum post. The reason is that somehow `spring-boot-devtools` were packaged in the lib (probably because they are as `runtime` scope).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Cmmn: docs for event listener automatic removal

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Make sure that spring-boot-devtools are in the provided scope so they don't get packaged spring-boot-devtools are automatically ignored by the spring-boot-maven-plugin when the jar / war is repacked Having spring-boot-devtools packaged causes problems when the application starts in jetty Closes gh-1389
